charges.charge_description: FRAUD TO GAIN FEDERAL EMPLOYEE COMPENSATION(1-2)

charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment: 13 months on each of Cts. 3 and 4 to run concurrent; Court recommends that deft. receive attention for his medical problems. Supervised release: 3 years on each of Counts 3 and 4 to run concurrent. Mandatory drug testing requirements are Waived. Special conditions of supervised release: Participate in a program for mental health treatment and contribute to the costs of the program; Open no new credit, make no new large purchases, etc., Provide probation officer access to any requested financial information; Submit to a search of your person, residence, place of business, etc., Cooperate in the collection of DNA. Fine: Waived; Special assessment: $200.00; Restitution: $97,945.72 to the U.S. Dept. of Labor and $59,944.00 to the VA Debt Management. Defendant is remanded to the custody of the U.S. Marshal
